sentence: More  than  1,200  people  were  killed  in  the  attack  by  Hamas  on  Israel  on  Oct.  7  and  more  than  240  people  were  kidnapped.

The  air-and-ground  assault  on  Gaza  launched  by  Israel  in  response  to  the  attack  has  displaced  millions  of  Palestinians  and  killed  more  than  16,000  people,  according  to  Gaza  health  officials.
